text: ai eemaanadaaron isamen usamen shaq nahin ki (yahood va nasaara ke) bahutere aalim zaahid logon ke maal (naahaq) chakh jaate hai aur (logon ko) khuda kee raah se rokate hain aur jo log sona aur chaandee jama karate jaate hain aur usako khuda kee raah mein kharch nahin karate to (ai rasool) un ko dardanaak azaab kee khushakhabaree suna do
